title: Gold Flirts With Record High on Soft US Jobs Data, Iran Tensions
description: Gold rose after US jobs data left expectations for additional US interest-rate cuts intact, while intensifying protests in Iran kept geopolitical tensions elevated.
content: Gold rose after US jobs data left expectations for additional US interest-rate cuts intact, while intensifying protests in Iran kept geopolitical tensions elevated.
